channel.title: Safety on HF Daily Paper Reviews by AI
channel.description: Recent content in Safety on HF Daily Paper Reviews by AI

item.title: o3-mini vs DeepSeek-R1: Which One is Safer?
item.description: ASTRAL, a novel automated safety testing tool, reveals DeepSeek-R1’s significantly higher unsafe response rate compared to OpenAI’s o3-mini, highlighting critical safety concerns in advanced LLMs.

item.title: Early External Safety Testing of OpenAI's o3-mini: Insights from the Pre-Deployment Evaluation
item.description: Researchers used ASTRAL to systematically test OpenAI’s 03-mini LLM’s safety, revealing key vulnerabilities and highlighting the need for continuous, robust safety mechanisms in large language models.
